1.name: Inception
1.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

2.name: Shutter Island
2.description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

3.name: I Spit on Your Grave
3.description: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.

4.name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
4.description: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.

5.name: Black Swan
5.description: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

6.name: Toy Story 3
6.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

7.name: Eat Pray Love
7.description: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

8.name: The Social Network
8.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

9.name: True Grit
9.description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

10.name: I'm Still Here
10.description: Documents Joaquin Phoenix's transition from the acting world to a career as an aspiring rapper.

11.name: Kick-Ass
11.description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

12.name: Legion
12.description: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

13.name: Insidious
13.description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

14.name: Iron Man 2
14.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

15.name: The Town
15.description: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the F.B.I. Agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

16.name: Srpski film
16.description: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

17.name: Clash of the Titans
17.description: Perseus demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

18.name: RED
18.description: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops Agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

19.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
19.description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

20.name: Due Date
20.description: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

21.name: Grown Ups
21.description: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

22.name: Tron
22.description: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

23.name: Tangled
23.description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

24.name: The King's Speech
24.description: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

25.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
25.description: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

26.name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
26.description: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

27.name: Alice in Wonderland
27.description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

28.name: Hot Tub Time Machine
28.description: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

29.name: The Losers
29.description: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

30.name: Burlesque
30.description: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

31.name: Blue Valentine
31.description: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

32.name: 127 Hours
32.description: An adventurous mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

33.name: The Other Guys
33.description: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

34.name: Incendies
34.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

35.name: The Last Airbender
35.description: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

36.name: Easy A
36.description: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

37.name: Habitación en Roma
37.description: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.

38.name: The Book of Eli
38.description: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

39.name: How to Train Your Dragon
39.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

40.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
40.description: A young fugitive Prince and Princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

41.name: The Expendables
41.description: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

42.name: Kari-gurashi no Arietti
42.description: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

43.name: The Fighter
43.description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

44.name: Love & Other Drugs
44.description: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

45.name: The A-Team
45.description: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

46.name: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
46.description: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

47.name: She's Out of My League
47.description: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

48.name: Let Me In
48.description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

49.name: Piranha 3D
49.description: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

50.name: It's Kind of a Funny Story
50.description: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.
